item.title: Traefik Reverse Proxy
item.description: We have seen in previous chapters, the configuration of NGINX reverse-proxy. However, today, with Docker, NGINX is a bit obsolete, and there are more dynamic solutions like Traefik, which we will talk about in this article. The Traefik reverse proxy Traefik is an open-source reverse-proxy (also called edge router). A reverse proxy is a program that manages access to servers in a network behind it, adding security, logging, and sometimes encryption.
